description:
Terrible news from headquarters: Tamama is to replace Keroro as their platoon leader!  Keroro`s devastated, and Tamama immediately lets his new power go to his head.  Will the platoon survive this dreadful new leader?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tamama Kyou kara Boku ga Taichou Desuu de Arimasu
Tamama devient chef à la place du chef
タママ 今日からボクが隊長ですぅ であります
